product_name: Sugoi Titan Thermal Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Don't let a chilly weather forecast derail your workout. The warm and breathable Sugoi Titan Thermal Pants shield you from the wind to keep you running in comfort. Windproof fabric on front of legs provides wind- and water-resistance. Fabric on back of legs offers freedom of motion, stretch and warmth. Articulated pants offer unrestricted movement. 2 front zip pockets and a single back zip pocket; 14 in. locking ankle zippers with gusset. Closeout.
short_description: Don't let a chilly weather forecast derail your workout. The warm and breathable Sugoi Titan Thermal Pants shield you from the wind to keep you running in comfort.
